descriptions.slots_since_last_congestion: Number of slots since last congestion event. Lower values indicate active congestion episode.
descriptions.link_total_throughput: Total throughput across all cells on the same link. Higher values indicate more competition for shared bandwidth.
descriptions.link_congestion_ratio: Fraction of cells on the link that are congested. High ratio indicates link-wide congestion.
descriptions.throughput_diff_1: Throughput change from 1 slots ago. Rate of change indicator.
descriptions.link_avg_throughput: Average throughput per cell on the shared link. Indicates per-cell share of link capacity.
descriptions.burstiness_coef_10: Coefficient of variation over 10 slots. Normalized burstiness measure.
descriptions.burstiness_coef_5: Coefficient of variation over 5 slots. Normalized burstiness measure.
descriptions.throughput_diff_2: Throughput change from 2 slots ago. Rate of change indicator.
descriptions.burstiness_coef_20: Coefficient of variation over 20 slots. Normalized burstiness measure.
descriptions.throughput_diff_10: Throughput change from 10 slots ago. Rate of change indicator.
descriptions.throughput_slope_10: Throughput trend over 10 slots. Positive values indicate increasing load.
descriptions.throughput_lag_1: Throughput value from 1 slots ago. Captures delayed temporal patterns.
descriptions.throughput_var_5: Variance of throughput over 5 slots. Emphasizes large deviations from mean.
descriptions.throughput_var_10: Variance of throughput over 10 slots. Emphasizes large deviations from mean.
